Data: Shakib to Watson, no run well outside the off stump, Watson was gunning for the big hit but checks his shot and reaches out to swat it away
Shakib to Watson, no run again well outside the off- this is the plan to Watto- pushed to the off
Shakib to Watson, 1 run Yep, that's the plan allright. This one is also well outside off and Watson reaches out and drags it to sweeper cover
Shakib to Ponting, 1 run closer to the off and Ricky punches it to sweeper cover
Shakib to Watson, no run closer to the off stump this time, full in length and Watson gets greedy and goes for a big swing to the long-on region but edges it to short fine-leg
Shakib to Watson, SIX runs Absolutely thumped! Six on the off side. They kept bowling there at him and this time Watson got close to the ball and whacked it over long-off. Flat-batted thump
Razzak to Ponting, no run gets forward to deflect this to midwicket
Razzak to Ponting, no run leans forward to defend it back to the bowler
Razzak to Ponting, 1 wide wide down the leg side, Ponting fails to connect with the sweep
Razzak to Ponting, no run nudged to the on side, Watson wants the single but is sent back
Razzak to Ponting, 1 run gets back to force this one down to sweeper cover

Razzak to Watson, OUT Watson is out. Will the entertainment end? The crowd roar in delight. It was a nice delivery, much slower through the air and Watson is beaten by the lack of pace. he went for the big slog sweep and missed it completely. The ball landed, winked at him and gently pegged back the off stump.
Razzak to Clarke, FOUR runs fuller, on the leg side, Clarke glances it down to fine-leg boundary
Shakib to Ponting, no run leans forward to work this to midwicket
Shakib to Ponting, no run stretches well forward to defend this down the track
Shakib to Ponting, no run leans forward to deflect it to midwicket
Shakib to Ponting, FOUR runs moves well outside leg and lifts this delivery over extra cover. The bowler had followed him but Ponting got well outside and went inside-out
Shakib to Ponting, 2 runs slower, outside leg, Ponting sweeps it to fine-leg region
Shakib to Ponting, no run leans forward and across to defend and it runs off the edge to the leg side
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run gets well back to punch this to long-off
Razzak to Ponting, no run on the off stump line, carefully dabbed to cover
Razzak to Ponting, FOUR runs opts for the sweep this time and sweeps well to pick up a boundary to backward-square leg boundary
Razzak to Ponting, 2 runs plays the paddle sweep this time and will collect two runs
Razzak to Ponting, no run quicker on the middle, Ponting backs away to push it to cover
Razzak to Ponting, no run leans forward to defend this to the on side
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run gets back to work this behind square-leg
Shakib to Ponting, no run on the leg stump line, lapped around the corner to short fine-leg
Shakib to Ponting, no run leans forward to defend to the off side
Shakib to Ponting, no run rushes down the track to defend to the leg side
Shakib to Ponting, no run on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
Shakib to Ponting, no run gets forward to defend to the midwicket fielder. Tight over
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run gets back to punch it out to deep cover
Razzak to Ponting, no run leans well forward to defend

Razzak to Ponting, OUT Ponting is not happy but he has to go. It was the full delivery on the middle and Ponting went for the sweep and missed it completely. that looked pretty close unless of course the ball was turning away sharply.
Razzak to Smith, no run tossed up on off, defended down the track
Razzak to Smith, no run again full and speared in, now that Watson is gone he is giving it some air. Smith defends.
Razzak to Smith, no run Smith advances, Razzak sees him and drifts it onto leg stump, Smith covers the line and flicks to midwicket
Shuvo to Clarke, no run loopy ball on leg stump, Clarke advances and plays it down the ground
Shuvo to Clarke, no run length ball, straightens from outside off and Clarke pushes it off the back foot
Shuvo to Clarke, no run on the pads, Clarke skips inside the line and flicks to midwicket. The run rate is beginning to look more believable now.
Shuvo to Clarke, no run again pushed back of a length and Clarke pushes into the covers.
Shuvo to Clarke, no run Clarke jumps out, gets to the flight and flicks but can't beat midwicket. I'll eat my hat if this is a maiden.
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run my hat survives. Clarke comes out and drives through extra cover for a single.
Razzak to Clarke, FOUR runs uses his feet ,reaches the pitch of the ball and lofts it to wide long-on
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run drives to the off side for a single
Razzak to Smith, 1 run skips down the track and drives to long-off
Razzak to Clarke, no run quickish arm ball , pushed back to the bowler
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run rocks back to punch it to sweeper cover
Razzak to Smith, no run goes down the track and drags it to right of midwicket where a diving stop is made
Shuvo to Clarke, no run gets back to deflect it to midwicket
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run moves down the track and works it past square-leg for a single
Shuvo to Smith, no run slower, fuller, on the off stump, pushes it out to the off
Shuvo to Smith, FOUR runs gets down the track and whips it to wide long-on boundary. Whippy!
Shuvo to Smith, no run jabs this to midwicket. high back lift
Kapali to Clarke, 1 run low full toss on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
Kapali to Hussey, no run this one straightens on the middle, jabbed out to the off
Kapali to Hussey, no run stays back to push this back to the bowler
Kapali to Hussey, 1 run slider outside off, punched out to deep point
Kapali to Clarke, 1 run drags this one really short and Clarke pulls this to deep midwicket
Kapali to Hussey, 1 run shortish delivery, pulled away for a single
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run floated full outside off, driven to right of mid-off
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run goes down the track and on drives to long-on
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run leans well forward to steer this through cover point
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run gets back to clip this behind square-leg
Shuvo to Hussey, 2 runs drifts to the pads and Hussey glances it to fine-leg region.
Shuvo to Hussey, no run leans forward to defend to the off side
Kapali to Clarke, no run gets forward to drive it back to the bowler
Kapali to Clarke, 1 run low full toss, whipped away to deep midwicket
Kapali to Hussey, 1 run Googly! Hussey cuts this to sweeper cover
Kapali to Clarke, no run backs away to punch it to sweeper cover
Kapali to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to on drive it to long-on
Kapali to Hussey, 1 run another googly, fuller this time, dabbed to backward point
Shuvo to Hussey, FOUR runs Lovely shot. He rushed down the track and caressed an off drive through wide mid-off region
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run flighted on the middle, on driven to long-on
Shuvo to Clarke, no run on the middle stump line, dabbed to square-leg
Shuvo to Clarke, no run well outside the off stump, cut away to point
Shuvo to Clarke, 3 runs skips down the track and flicks it away to fine-leg region. Mortaza makes a fine diving save there. He lunged forward and back-flicked the ball back into play
Shuvo to Hussey, no run on the off stump line, defended to the bowler
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run push-drives this to long-on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run gets back to push this back to the bowler
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run slower, bit more air, fuller, flicked past square-leg for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run stays round the stumps for the righty as well, clipped to deep midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run not all that short but Hussey rocks back to cut to sweeper cover
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run moves down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
Shuvo to Hussey, FOUR runs plays the reverse sweep and gets the placement superbly. it was a reverse paddle and he hit it well to the right of short third man
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run tickles this to right of short third man again - not a reverse sweep, he steered this one- fielded
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run sashays down the track and off drives to long-off
Shuvo to Hussey, 1 run flighted full outside, on driven to long-on
Shuvo to Clarke, no run from round the stumps, around off, punched to Shakib at short extra cover
Shuvo to Clarke, 1 run slower, flighted, fuller, and Clarke gets into his comfort zone - down the track and drives it to long-on
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run on driven again for yet another single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run leans forward to dab this to short midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run stretches forward to push this wide of cover for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run stays back to punch it to long-off for a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run goes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run slightly short in length, cut to backward point
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run stays well back to punch this to long-off for a single
Shakib to Hussey, no run on the middle and off line, turned to midwicket
Shakib to Hussey, no run on the pads, turned to square-leg
Shakib to Hussey, FOUR runs floated on the leg stump line, swept away to the square-leg boundary
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run rotates the strike with an on drive to long-on
Shakib to Clarke, no run slower, turning away, cut to extra cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run works this through wide midwicket for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run gets forward to work it to midwicket
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run retreats further back inside the crease, pulled away to deep midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run gets forward to push this back to the offie
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run turns away from the off stump, Hussey works it away to sweeper cover
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run moves down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and blocks it towards midwicket
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run yet another single down to long-on. Milkmen at work here
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run And now through covers. risk-free
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run gets back to steer this to sweeper cover.
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run The singles keep coming. This one has been milked through to deep cover
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run Cut away to deep point. One more. Easy as easy gets.
Shakib to Clarke, no run Dot ball. Punched straight to short extra cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run Another cut. Another single. Australia skip along
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run moves down the track and drives to long-off
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run slightly short and Clarke pulls it away to deep square-leg for a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run drifts in on the off and middle, full, driven to cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run opens his stance to drag the short ball to deep midwicket
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run works this to fine-leg region for a single
Shakib to Clarke, 2 runs gets well back to cut this to right of sweeper cover
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run leans well forward to drive it to long-off
Shakib to Hussey, no run moves down the track, doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and lunges forward to defend
Shakib to Hussey, FOUR runs Shakib errs on length this time. Too full and Hussey unfurls the sweep shot. Powerful.
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run pulls this to deep midwicket for a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run gets back to cut this one for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run tries to punch this to the off side but the slowness of the ball meant he edged it to the on side
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run on driven to the right of Mahmudullah who makes a diving stop
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 wide slips in a wide down the leg side
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run pulls but Shakib dives to his right at square-leg. Fine stop
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run nudges this towards Shakib for a quick single.
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run tossed up full, driven down to long-on
Razzak to Hussey, no run slowish turn back into Hussey who taps it towards Clarke
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run leans forward to drive this wide of midwicket for a single
Razzak to Clarke, no run moves down the track and edges it to the bowler
Razzak to Clarke, 2 runs slips this to the leg side, worked away through backward square-leg region
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run slightly slow, stops on Clarke who reaches out, adjusts to the lack of pace and cuts to sweeper cover
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run Hussey pulls but Mortaza is there at deep midwicket.
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run turns from the off stump line, pushed to cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run fuller, just outside off and hussey square drives for a single
Mahmudullah to Clarke, no run slower off break from round the stumps, defended on the front foot
Mahmudullah to Clarke, 1 run gets back to clip this to deep midwicket for a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run on the off stump line, chopped away back down the track
Mahmudullah to Hussey, FOUR runs 50 up for Hussey. Run a ball. This one was short and Hussey wallops it over midwicket.

Razzak to Clarke, 1 leg bye run out missred goes for the pull but misses. The ball turns to hit the thigh and runs to backward point region. Hussey calls Clarke for a single and they rush across to make it just in time to beat the throw at the non striker's end. Razzak didn't collect the throw cleanly and broke the
Razzak to Hussey, no run leans forward to push this to the off
Razzak to Hussey, no run reverse sweeps this but straight to short third man
Razzak to Hussey, FOUR runs Crashes this to deep square-leg boundary with a powerful sweep shot. It was outside the leg stump line
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run slower, flighted, just outside off, squeezed past backward point
Razzak to Clarke, 1 run gets well back to punch this to long-on for a single
Mortaza to Clarke, no run full delivery, the slow yorker, outside off, Clarke lets it go
Mortaza to Clarke, 2 runs moves outside leg and heaves this through mid-on. he doesn't time it well and that allows them to come back for the second
Mortaza to Clarke, no run fullish, hint of inswing and it beats Clarke's attempt to flick and raps the pad. going down leg, though

Mortaza to Clarke, OUT Clatter! Mortaza has knocked out the off stump. The Batting Powerplay strikes. It was the full delivery, just short of the blockhole, on the off stump line, Clarke shuffled across and went for the big across-the-line swing. Mistake. No wood on leather but the opposite.
Mortaza to Ferguson, no run full in length, on the middle, defended to the on side

Mortaza to Ferguson, 1 leg bye Shout for lbw. Mortaza thinks its pad first. VB Chandrasekhar, on air, thinks its close. Let's see on the replay. it was the full delivery on the off stump line and Ferguson was very late in getting forward to defend. Was it pad first? Or bat first? Replays please
Shafiul to Ferguson, 1 run moves in to the off stump line, Ferguson plays it very late and pushes it to extra cover. They rush for the single. Direct hit at the non striker's end but he is home
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run overpitched on the legs, flicked away for a single
Shafiul to Ferguson, 1 run pushed away to extra cover for a single
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run low full toss on the boot, flicked away for a single
Shafiul to Ferguson, 1 run driven to mid-off where Nafees makes a diving half-stop to his left
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run goes for the yorker, misses the blockhole, flicked away to deep midwicket
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run slower one, fullish, eased to long-off for a single
Mortaza to Ferguson, OUT Another one goes down in the batting Powerplay and wicket no 150 for Mortaza Congrats sir. It was the full delivery and it was hit straight to mid-off. Fergy has combusted.
Mortaza to Johnson, no run in the zone outside off, angling away and Mitch is beaten, poking at it
Mortaza to Johnson, no run lovely delivery, cutting away from Mitch, who is beaten again.
Mortaza to Johnson, no run beaten by the slower one this time. Supah over so far. Mitch was too early into his big shot and the ball gently wobbled past him
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run on the middle stump, full in length, looking for the lbw, mitch dabs it to right of cover
Shafiul to Johnson, FOUR runs Smashed to the straight boundary. Mitch brought the bat down in a hurry and knifed through the line.
Shafiul to Johnson, no run shortish ball outside off, Mitch is very eager to pull but goes too hard at it and misses. Hussey walks over for a chat
Shafiul to Johnson, 1 run fuller, outside off, dragged down to long-on
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run very full, straight, eased to long-off for a single
Shafiul to Johnson, 1 run backs away but mistimes this towards mid-off. He made contact with the toe end of the bat and Mitch inspects the damage.
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run shortish, pulled away for a single
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run slower cutter angling away from Hussey who dabs it to backward point for a single
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run leans forward to scoop this short of extra cover. Mushfiqur holds his head. It almost carried to the fielder
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run another slower one outside off, nudged to short third man region
Mortaza to Johnson, FOUR runs Big swing and he connects. It was the full delivery on the off stump line and Mitch swings it to the midwicket boundary.
Mortaza to Johnson, SIX runs Crunchy. Meaty. Yummy! Mitch backed away to the leg side and crashed this full delivery over long-off.

Mortaza to Johnson, SIX runs And again. He has hammered this one. He moved outside leg and Mortaza, who had bowled couple of very good overs in this spell, again offers a full-pitched hit-me delivery. Mitch has crashed it over long-off
Shafiul to Hussey, 2 runs reaches outside off and cuts the short-of-length delivery wide of sweeper cover
Shafiul to Hussey, SIX runs Supah pull! Stylish and effective. He swivelled off the front foot and unfurled a nonchalant pull shot over square-leg boundary.
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run fullish delivery on the middle, driven to long-off
Shafiul to Johnson, FOUR runs full and well outside off and Mitch reaches out to squeeze it - edged away- to third man boundary
Shafiul to Johnson, 1 run slower cutter, outside off, dragged down to long-on
Shafiul to Hussey, 1 run flicked away for a single
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run gets back to clip this through midwicket
Mahmudullah to Johnson, no run slow off break from round the stumps, pushed out to cover
Mahmudullah to Johnson, 1 run slightly slower, full in length, forced away to deep cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run turns away from the off, dabbed to backward point
Mahmudullah to Johnson, 1 run slightly short in length, dragged down to long-on. Mitch isn't happy
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 wide slips a wide down the leg side
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run drifts in towards middle, on driven to long-on
Mortaza to Hussey, no run fullish delivery, almost an yorker, dug out back to the bowler
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run gets forward to straight drive past the bowler for a single
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run low full toss outside off and Mitch as ever doesn't lean fully into his forward drives and again makes contact with the bottom of the bat
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 leg bye on the pads, rolls away for a leg bye
Mortaza to Johnson, 2 runs full and straight, driven straight to long-on. Just a single.
Mortaza to Johnson, 1 run full pitched well outside off, sliced out to sweeper cover

Mahmudullah to Johnson, FOUR runs Inside edge! It kept a touch low outside off and Mitch doesn't quite get into a good position to cut. His weight was falling back as he tried to reach out wit ha cut. Profitable inside edge takes it to fine-leg boundary, thoug
Mahmudullah to Johnson, 1 run fetches it from outside off and drills it to long-on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run turns away from the off stump, stabbed to backward point
Mahmudullah to Johnson, 1 run well outside off, turning away, cut away to left of sweeper cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, no run gets forward and drives straight to cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run presses back to cut to deep cover region
Mortaza to Hussey, SIX runs Boshed! He went down on his knee and swung this low full toss over midwicket.
Mortaza to Hussey, no run yorker length outside off and Hussey can't get bat to ball
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run drives this to long-off for a single
Mortaza to Johnson, OUT Holes out to deep midwicket. Mitch show is over. It was a length delivery on the middle and Mitchell Johnson slogged it straight to deep midwicket.
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-off
Mortaza to Paine, 1 run leans forward to on drive this for a single
Mahmudullah to Paine, 1 run gets back to clip this to deep midwicket
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run rushes down the track and drives to long-on
Mahmudullah to Paine, 1 run turns in to middle stump line, pushed down to long-on
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run gets back to cut this to sweeper cover for single
Mahmudullah to Paine, no run spins in, moves past the attempted leg-side whip and hits the pad. It was missing the leg stump.
Mahmudullah to Paine, 1 run gets forward to on drive to long-on
Razzak to Paine, 2 runs paddles it around the corner for couple of runs
Razzak to Paine, 1 run short and wide, cut away to sweeper cover
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run plays the sweep shot to rotate the strike
Razzak to Paine, OUT loud cry for lbw and the ump has raised the finger. He went for a reverse sweep but missed.
Razzak to Hastings, no run gets back to defend to the on side
Razzak to Hastings, no run around that off stump line, pushed out to cover
Mahmudullah to Hussey, FOUR runs rushes down the track, gets outside leg and lifts this inside-out over extra cover. Fab strike.

Mahmudullah to Hussey, FOUR runs And again. he sashayed down the track, got outside leg and crashed this over extra cover. Dropped by Shakib at extra cover. He got his hands up but it burst through the fingers.
Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run works this to the leg side for a single
Mahmudullah to Hastings, 1 run punched out to long-on for a single.

Mahmudullah to Hussey, 1 run 2006. 2007. 2011. This is the third hundred for Mike Hussey. He punched it through to the deep cover region. A very fine innings and his mates in the dressing room show their appreciation
Razzak to Hussey, 3 runs worked this behind square-leg for couple of runs
Razzak to Hastings, 1 run pushes it to midwicket and get across for the quick run. Had there been a direct hit at the non striker's end, he would have been a goner
Razzak to Hussey, no run goes for the big slog sweep but doesn't connect properly
Razzak to Hussey, FOUR runs Neat! He skipped down the track and creamed this to wide long-off boundary
Razzak to Hussey, 1 run dabs this to the on side for a single
Razzak to Hastings, SIX runs Monstrous hit! He went down the track and has killed it. The white ball sails high over long-on boundary.
Shafiul to Hussey, OUT Looked pretty plumb. Full, straight, and on the middle. Hussey went for the paddle sweep but missed. Super-cool knock this. His third ton.
Shafiul to Doherty, 1 run driven down to long-off for a single
Shafiul to Hastings, 1 run full delivery, driven to the off side for a single
Shafiul to Doherty, 1 run nice slower one, stabbed down the track and Shafiul should have had a run out. The non striker had backed up too far but shafiul failed to stop the ball.
Shafiul to Hastings, FOUR runs full toss and that has been dealt with violence. A fierce square drive.
Shafiul to Hastings, FOUR runs Hastings finishes things off in some style. Another full delivery and Hastings square drives it to the point boundary.
Join us in a while for the chase. Time for a break.
Australia have piled up 361 for 8. Watson exploded, Ponting caressed, Clarke nurdled, Hussey milked, Johnson heaved, and Hastings clubbed as Australia ran away to a huge total.
Welcome back. Will Bangladesh try going after this target? Not many of you seem to think that they would. Let's see.
Johnson to Tamim, no run good delivery on a good length on the middle, curving away slightly, Tamim gets the bat in front of the pad to stab it to the off side
Johnson to Tamim, no run in the zone outside off stump, leaving Tamim, who shoulders arms
Johnson to Tamim, no run outswinger outside off and Tamim tries to go after the width but doesn't quite lean into the attempt. And is beaten
Johnson to Tamim, FOUR runs lovely whippy shot. It was the full delivery on the middle, looking for the lbw, but Tamim arrested the front-foot movement and wristed it stylishly through midwicket
Johnson to Tamim, no run leans forward to defend the length delivery tailing away from him

Johnson to Tamim, SIX runs Six over third man! It was a shortish delivery outside off and Tamim cleared the sink. Big slash. The ball flew over the very wide third man fielder who back-pedaled and jumped but in vain.
Hastings to Imrul, 1 wide wide outside off stump and Keyes tries to reach it
Hastings to Imrul, FOUR runs Hammered! good signs so far. It was the length delivery and width on offer too and Imrul flays it over extra cover
Hastings to Imrul, no run straighter and driven back to Hastings who threatens to throw it back
Hastings to Imrul, no run beaten! it was the good-length delivery this time and that had Imrul Kayes in trouble. he went for the on-the-up shot but didn't connect
Hastings to Imrul, no run rushes down the track, looking for the big hit, and is beaten. Hmmm
Hastings to Imrul, no run leans forward to push-drive this good-length delivery to mid-off
Hastings to Imrul, no run Wild slog attempted! He took couple of steps down the track and went for a huge swing . No luck. The keeper collects
Johnson to Tamim, no run goes for the yorker, not quite at the blockhole. on the leg stump line and it hits Tamim on the pad
Johnson to Tamim, FOUR runs Supah drive! A length delivery outside off stump and Tamim crashes it through extra cover.
Johnson to Tamim, 1 run on the middle stump line, full in length, dabbed to midwicket for a single
Johnson to Imrul, no run the lifting delivery outside off and the batsman lets it go through to the keeper
Johnson to Imrul, FOUR runs Fat lucky inside edge! He went for the big slog over mid-on and the ball ran away to the fine-leg boundary. Mitch lets out a cry of agony
Johnson to Imrul, 2 runs Kayes wrists this past square-leg
Hastings to Tamim, FOUR runs Wonderfully fierce cut! It was the shortish delivery outside off and Tamim has unfurled a lovely square-cut
Hastings to Tamim, no run full and in the channel outside off, Tamim tries to dispatch it to his hometown Chittagong but misses
Hastings to Tamim, no run gets forward and across this time to steer it to point
Hastings to Tamim, FOUR runs Thump-o-rama continues! Tamim gets on the front foot and scythes through the line, up and over mid-off
Hastings to Tamim, 1 run slower one, on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
Hastings to Imrul, no run gets forward to drive crisply but straight to extra cover
Johnson to Tamim, FOUR runs The violence continues unabated. Short and wide and Tamim flays it through point.
Johnson to Tamim, FOUR runs not a bad delivery actually, full and on the middle, looking for the lbw, but Tamim gets forward in a hurry and lifted it neatly over short midwicket.
Johnson to Nafees, no run length delivery on the middle, jabbed away to the leg side
Johnson to Nafees, no run gets forward to push it to cover
Johnson to Nafees, no run fullish, skidding away outside off, edged away to backward point
Hastings to Imrul, no run leans forward to defend this to the off side
Hastings to Imrul, 1 run Slower one, full and on the middle, Kayes waits and plays the pick-up shot over square-leg
Hastings to Nafees, no run leans forward to defend
Hastings to Nafees, no run leans forward to push this quietly to the off side
Hastings to Nafees, 1 run still from round the stumps, on the middle and leg, worked wide of mid-on where Pattinson makes a fine diving stop
Hastings to Imrul, no run tries a slower one outside off, on a length, hit uppishly but short of mid-off
Johnson to Nafees, no run leans forward to defend the length delivery to the off side
Johnson to Nafees, no run almost through him! It was a length delivery skidding towards middle and off and the batsman played outside the line and edged it to the leg side
Johnson to Nafees, no run on the off stump line, pushed away to point
Johnson to Nafees, 1 run full pitched delivery on the legs, flicked away for a single
Johnson to Imrul, FOUR runs Kayes breaks free with a cut shot. Width on offer and he lashed it over backward point
Johnson to Imrul, 2 runs fullish delivery on the middle, worked through midwicket for couple of runs
Hastings to Nafees, no run a good-length delivery coming in from round the stumps, dabbed to the leg side
Hastings to Nafees, no run moves forward to drive to mid-off
Hastings to Nafees, 2 runs on the pads, tucked around the corner for couple of runs
Hastings to Nafees, no run homing in on the off and middle, pushed out to cover
Hastings to Nafees, 1 run runs this down to third man for a single
Hastings to Imrul, no run slower one, on the off and middle, pushed down to the on side of the pitch
Pattinson to Nafees, no run leans forward to work it to wide mid-on region for a single
Pattinson to Nafees, 1 run on the pads, clipped to deep square-leg region
Pattinson to Imrul, no run leans forward to on drive to mid-on
Pattinson to Imrul, 2 runs on the middle stump line, worked away through midwicket for two runs
Pattinson to Imrul, no run fullish, on the off stump line, dug out to the off side
Pattinson to Imrul, FOUR runs collects a boundary with a flick shot. Overpitched on legs and Kayes gets his wrists working over time to put that one to square-leg boundary
Watson to Nafees, 1 run from round the stumps, slower cutter on the off, run down to third man for a single
Watson to Imrul, FOUR runs Lovely straight drive. He leaned forward to caress the full delivery past his partner at the other end
Watson to Imrul, FOUR runs Touch of class in this. length delivery outside off stump and Kayes got forward and across and played a sweet punchy shot through cover point
Watson to Imrul, no run the bouncer this time and Kayes hops to ride the bounce and taps it down in front of him
Watson to Imrul, no run gets forward to defend this back down the track
Watson to Imrul, no run extra bounce on this short delivery outside off, Kayes was cramped for room and beaten by that bounce, and ends up stabbing at thin air
Pattinson to Nafees, no run in the zone outside of f stump, doesn't connect on his waft
Pattinson to Nafees, 1 run dabs this to right of backward point for a single
Pattinson to Imrul, 1 run bouncy delivery coming in from round the stumps, pushed out to point
Pattinson to Nafees, 1 run full delivery outside off stump, steered to Ponting and underarms to Paine who fails to collect it. it bounced in front of him and Paine missed that! overthrows
Pattinson to Imrul, no run gets back to deflect this to point. Ponting holds on to the ball this time
Pattinson to Imrul, 1 run dabs this delivery bouncing around off stump, tapped close on the off side and they rush across
Watson to Imrul, 1 run leans forward to drive to right of mid-off where Clarke intervenes with a drive
Watson to Nafees, FOUR runs Whack! Nafees gets forward and across to thump this length delivery on the up and through covers.
Watson to Nafees, no run slower one outside off, defended to the off side
Watson to Nafees, no run full delivery on the off, from round the stumps, pushed back to Watto
Watson to Nafees, no run really full delivery, pushed out to the off. Watson has tightened up his line after that wide delivery earlier in the over
Watson to Nafees, no run homing in on the off and middle line, full in length, defended to the off, they think about a single but decided against it
Pattinson to Imrul, 1 run clips this through to deep midwicket for a single
Pattinson to Nafees, 1 run runs this down to third man for a single
Pattinson to Imrul, 4 leg byes slips down the leg side, from round the stumps, the batsman fails to connect wit the leg glance but it runs off the thigh pad to fine-leg boundary

Pattinson to Imrul, FOUR runs No slips and Kayes has steered it through the unmanned area! It was a length delivery outside off and Kayes opens the bat-face and collects a boundary. Pattinson holds his head
Pattinson to Imrul, 1 run full in length outside off and Kayes edges his square drive down to third man
Pattinson to Nafees, no run bangs this one short, it moves towards ribcage, Nafees stabs it on to his body
Watson to Imrul, no run fullish delivery from round the stumps, pushed out to the on side
Watson to Imrul, 2 runs short in length on the off, steered wide of third man for couple of runs
Watson to Imrul, 1 wide this one drifts down the leg side and it will be a wide
Watson to Imrul, no run on the middle stump line, deflected to midwicket
Watson to Imrul, 1 run stays adjacent to the line of this delivery and guides it down to third man
Watson to Nafees, 1 run slower cutter outside off, again tapped down to third man
Watson to Imrul, no run fulller in length, on the off stump line, from round the stumps, driven to short extra cover
Hastings to Nafees, no run dabs this to midwicket.
Hastings to Nafees, 1 run on the pads, turned past square-leg for a single
Hastings to Imrul, no run straightens on the off stump line, from round the stumps, steered to point
Hastings to Imrul, no run on the middle and off line, defends to the off side
Hastings to Imrul, no run short in length, coming in from that angle, worked to midwicket
Hastings to Imrul, 1 run slightly short, pulled away to deep square-leg region
Doherty to Imrul, 1 run stays back to clip this to deep square-leg region
Doherty to Nafees, 2 runs goes down on his keen to sweep it to right of square-leg where Hastings makes a half-stop. it bounced awkwardly in front of him
Doherty to Nafees, no run spins in from outside off, defended off the back foot
Doherty to Nafees, 1 run good delivery, loopy turning delivery, dabbed to square-leg
Doherty to Imrul, 1 run flighted outside off, on a length, nudged towards backward point
Doherty to Nafees, no run quicker one, on the off, pushed out to short extra cover
Hastings to Imrul, no run the bouncer outside off, swayed away
Hastings to Imrul, 1 run comes in towards the rib cage, glanced down to fine-leg region
Hastings to Nafees, no run fullish on the middle, driven to left of the track and the tall burly Hastings plucks it out nonchalantly
Hastings to Nafees, no run gets this to straighten on the middle and off line, defended to the off side
Hastings to Nafees, 1 run stays back to work this past square-leg for a single
Hastings to Imrul, no run full one, on the middle and off, flicks this to midwicket
Doherty to Nafees, 1 run presses back to work this with the turn to backward square-leg
Doherty to Imrul, no run leans forward to defend to the on side
Doherty to Imrul, no run flighted outside off, well outside off, Kayes reaches out to drive but its intercepted at extra cover
Doherty to Imrul, FOUR runs Top shot! it was slightly short in length and Kayes rocked back to cut it late wide of short third man fielder. 50 up as well So far so good from him.
Doherty to Imrul, 1 run leans forward to on drive to long-on
Doherty to Nafees, no run beaten! reaches out for the flighted delivery well outside off and goes for the off drive but the ball breaks back in and goes through the bat and pad gap

Hastings to Imrul, 2 runs The bouncer , well directed, on the body and Kayes gets in a tangle and tries to stab it away. it went off his left forearm and goes clear of the keeper. Given as runs, though
Hastings to Imrul, FOUR runs Another good lifting delivery and Kayes edgers the cut and Paine goes flying to his left but the ball flew over his left glove
Hastings to Imrul, no run taps this to backward point
Hastings to Imrul, FOUR runs Slapped! This was short in length and moving towards the pads, Kayes swivels around to crunch-pull it to deep square-
Hastings to Imrul, no run leans forward to defend this to the off side
Hastings to Imrul, no run on the off stump line, defended to the off side of the pitch
Doherty to Nafees, no run pushes this to the right of the bowler
Doherty to Nafees, 2 runs rocks back to cut this hard to deep backward point region
Doherty to Nafees, 1 run fuller, just outside off, pushed out to cover region
Doherty to Imrul, 1 run gets back to tuck it past square-leg
Doherty to Nafees, no run on the middle and leg, deflected to midwicket

Watson to Imrul, 1 run and tucks this quietly to the on side for a single
Watson to Nafees, no run slow cutter outside off stump and Nafees is beaten, pushing inside the line

Watson to Imrul, no run almost run out ...It was pushed to the cover region .. both set off for a single,. both decide against it. Nafees tries to get back and was out of the crease when the throw missed the stumps
Watson to Imrul, 2 runs fullish outside off, square driven to deep backward point region. 100 of the partnership up

Pattinson to Imrul, OUT Imrul Kayes has fallen after a brave fine knock. Siddons looks shocked. It was a full delivery angling away from Kayes who goes for the off drive. He reaches out, away from his body and get a thin edge. The debutant James Pattinson gets his moment under the sun.
Pattinson to Mahmudullah, no run lovely yorker just outside the off stump, the batsman tries to jab it away but the yorker screams under his bat but some how misses the off stump
Smith to Nafees, no run
Smith to Nafees, 1 run low full toss, tapped gently to midwicket
Smith to Mahmudullah, no run
Smith to Mahmudullah, 1 run quickish, just outside off, full, tapped to short third man
Smith to Nafees, no run lunges across to defend to cover
Smith to Nafees, 1 run dipping full toss, lunges out to ping long-off. 50 for Nafees 2nd in a row. Applause around the arena
Pattinson to Nafees, 1 run pushes this to cover point for a single.

Johnson to Nafees, no run full delivery on the off stump line, driven back to Mitchell

Johnson to Nafees, OUT Nafees is done by the slower one. A lovely change of pace and Nafees picked it up very late. He lunged out in the end and ended up stabbing it straight up in the air. Watson came in and took it around short-leg position. Australia tighten the screws.
Johnson to Shakib, no run yorker first up, similar to the one that got Tamim. Shakib keeps it out cautiously
Johnson to Shakib, 1 run short ball, hustles Shakib into the pull and he top edges it backward of square for one. Was in the air for a while, but landed safe.
Smith to Shakib, no run loopy leggie outside off, pushed from the crease to the covers
Smith to Shakib, 1 run full on off stump, forced down to long off for a single
Smith to Mahmudullah, 1 run loopy ball on the pads, nudged off the toes to fine leg for one. 200 is up.
Smith to Shakib, no run short ball, he looks to pull and gets it onto the pad to square leg for one
Smith to Shakib, 1 run hangs back and looks to force into the covers for a single
Smith to Mahmudullah, 1 run Mahmudullah steers backward of point for a single
Johnson to Mahmudullah, 2 runs gets off the back foot to punch it through wide mid-on
Johnson to Mahmudullah, 1 run runs this down to third man
Johnson to Shakib, 1 run full delivery outside off and Shakib hits a powerful cover drive but its intercepted at sweeper cover
Johnson to Mahmudullah, no run from round the stumps, wide outside off stump, left alone

Johnson to Shakib, 2 runs banged in short on the body, pulled down past square-leg
Smith to Mahmudullah, no run leans forward to nudge it to the on side of the pitch
Smith to Mahmudullah, SIX runs Screamer! He cleared the front foot and slog-swept like Hansie Cronje. The style ie. It flies over cowcorner!

Smith to Mahmudullah, no run tries the Tendulkar sweep almost behind the keeper but misses and is hit on the pad. The ball rolls behind the stumps. Pain breaks the stumps and appeals for stumping. Riad had stepped out almost absentmindedly but just about realises what he has had done and got his back foot back in rea
Smith to Mahmudullah, 3 runs plays the paddle sweep this time and does it really well. He will pick up three runs for that effoft
Smith to Shakib, no run goes for the slog sweep and edges it to short fine-leg
Smith to Shakib, 3 runs floated just outside off and Shakib partly edges it, partly steers to third man region

Watson to Mushfiqur, no run and dabs this to midwicket. The crowd are turning restless.
Watson to Mushfiqur, 1 run around that off stump, run down to third man
Watson to Mahmudullah, 1 run works this form the middle stump to right of midwicket for a single

Doherty to Mahmudullah, no run turns from the middle stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch

Watson to Kapali, 1 run dropped! What a clanger from Clarke! Kapali chipped a head-high dolly to cover where Clarke made a right royal mess of it.
Johnson to Kapali, no run full and angling away from kapali who has a swing and a miss
Johnson to Kapali, 1 run Kapali keeps testing Clarke. This chipped shot is just wide to the left of Clarke at mid-off
Johnson to Mahmudullah, no run in the channel outside off stump, Mahmudullah jabs outside the line and the ball rushes through the bat and pad gap and just past the off stump
Johnson to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs Whacked! It was a length delivery outside off and Riad has bashed it over mid-o n
Johnson to Mahmudullah, no run outside off stump line, steered to point

Johnson to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs 50 up in some style. He stayed back, adjacent to the line of the length delivery outside off and square drove it on the up to backward point boundary. nicely punched away
Johnson to Mahmudullah, 1 run pushes this to cover point for a single
Johnson to Kapali, no run the high bouncer and he tries to upper cut it but can't get bat to ball.
Hastings to Mahmudullah, no run moves outside leg but ends up jabbing it to the off

Hastings to Kapali, no run banged in short and Kapali is late on the pull. Climbs over the flashing blade

Hastings to Kapali, 1 run Full delivery, drives this to covers.
Johnson to Shuvo, 2 byes in the zone outside off stump, moves past the defensive prod and it wobbles as it reaches Paine who makes a mess of it. Posthumous swing!
Johnson to Shuvo, 5 wide Paine goes diving to his right to stop the wide but can't get there in time. Wayward delivery
Johnson to Shuvo, 1 wide A wide down the off side this time. Release going awry

Pattinson to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs Wow! Whiplashed! He moved outside leg and lashed the full delivery over backward point
Pattinson to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs Crash! The bouncer and Riad unfurls a spanking pull shot to fine-leg boundary.
Pattinson to Mahmudullah, 2 runs low full toss on the middle, driven past the bowler for couple of runs. Australia have won the series 3-0.
That's it from us. Good bye and good luck.
Please wait for the quotes from the post-match ceremony

Much better show from Bangladesh. This is their second highest score - they hit 296 against India - against Test-playing nations. Tamim gave the start, Kayes built on it and there were contributions from Nafees and Mahmudullah but Australia still win this by 66 runs.
Australia won by 66 runs
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
